channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Consumer IOT, Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2020-11208|2024-08-04T11:28:13.818Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto%2C%20snapdragon%20consumer%20iot%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
